translations: v．用花环装饰：用花环、花圈等装饰物装点某人或某物。
· The villagers were garlanding the statue of the goddess.
村民们正在用花环装饰女神的雕像。

sentences.sentence: China may be garlanding the nation's bankers as "model workers", but as every model knows, fashion can be fickle.
sentences.translation: 中国也许正给该国银行家戴上“先进人士”的花冠，但正如每一个模特儿都知道的，时尚很容易变化。
